nodes.text: The ganjuko graveyard was a remote, hidden valley on the planet Kothlis, outside the city of Tal'cara, formed by a large meteorite that struck more than a century before the Galactic Civil War. Thousands of ganjuko creatures were killed in the strike, leaving their skeletons strewn about the crater. Many coveted the graveyard's secret location for the promise of wealth that lay in the ganjukos' bones, which commanded high prices among Bothan society.
